attributes.action: Every Superstore to provide disabled trolleys. More than one per store.
attributes.additional_details: I have previously been in contact with 5 supermarkets asking about their trolley availability, With not much luck.
attributes.background: I have a 7 year old son with special needs. On many occasions I haven’t been able to go food shopping because my son doesn’t fit in a trolley anymore as he is 7!! He needs a disabled trolley but Sadly not all supermarkets provide them. And the ones that do only supply the one!

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. It's already a requirement for businesses to make reasonable adjustments to ensure that disabled people can access their premises, but it's for businesses and the courts to decide exactly what is necessary.
